body: @transformPantyhose Stop being cringe. Feyris is right. Using comments to express dislike and saying better stuff should be translated is not a big deal. I like this one but no need to go all fanboy.
@Feyris FYI, the one who translate this is the mangaka himself, because he can speak english, it's not perfect but understandable at least

@feyris blacklist the tags if you hate it so much. The reason these are translated is because either because someone was hired to translate or they used machine translating and pasted the result. If its from someone else, they arent likely doing this for free :/

I hope more pages get translated soon.

Also Feyris sounds like a pain to deal with. Guy goes to the comment session to bash the hentai => someone bashes his comment => he gets super defensive. yikes.

@bloopbloop52 this is a comment section. I'm commenting. I didn't like it, I'm commenting on that, and I'm also commenting on the fact that I wish the gender bender doujins that gets translated were good ones instead of this one. I'm already trying to learn japanese (slowly cause I don't have a lot of free time) but in the meantime I'm simply expressing my distaste for doujins like this. Is this illegal to express yourself ?
i have to give jee god damn need to check those differential equations
I can confirm the differential equations are correct
Also feyris, if you want the manga you read to be translated... go hire a translator or google translate it yourself. Not sure why you came here to complain
Cant wait for the next one!
I'm begging translators to work on good gender bender doujins instead of gross possesion garbage like this
It's more too ecchi anime or sumthing
